001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers;
002
003import java.math.BigInteger;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005
006public interface JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> {
007
008    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<BigInteger>> RATIONAL_BIGINT = new RationalBigIntegerSupport();
009    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<Long>> RATIONAL_LONG = new RationalLongSupport();
010    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<Integer>> RATIONAL_INT = new RationalIntegerSupport();
011    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Double> DOUBLE = new DoubleSupport();
012    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> FLOAT = new FloatSupport();
013
014    String name();
015
016    N[] createArray(int length);
017
018    N[][] createArrayOfArrays(int rows, int columns);
019
020    N multiply(N first, N second);
021
022    N multiply(N first, int second);
023
024    N divide(N first, N second);
025
026    N divide(N first, int second);
027
028    N add(N first, N second);
029
030    N add(N first, int second);
031
032    default N subtract(N first, N second) {
033        return add(first, multiply(minusOne(), second));
034    }
035
036    default N subtract(N first, int second) {
037        return add(first, -second);
038    }
039
040    default N negate(N value) {
041        return multiply(minusOne(), value);
042    }
043
044    N minusOne();
045
046    N one();
047
048    N zero();
049
050    default N inverse(N value) {
051        return divide(one(), value);
052    }
053
054    default boolean isZero(N value) {
055        return equals(zero(), value);
056    }
057
058    default boolean isOne(N value) {
059        return equals(one(), value);
060    }
061
062    boolean equals(N first, N second);
063
064    boolean isGreaterThan(N first, N second);
065
066    default boolean isPositive(N value) {
067        return isGreaterThan(value, zero());
068    }
069
070    default boolean isNegative(N value) {
071        return isGreaterThan(zero(), value);
072    }
073
074    default boolean hasSameSign(N first, N second) {
075        return isZero(first) || isZero(second)
076                || isPositive(first) && isPositive(second)
077                || isNegative(first) && isNegative(second);
078    }
079
080    N squareRoot(N value);
081
082    default N absolute(N value) {
083        return isGreaterThan(zero(), value) ? multiply(minusOne(), value) : value;
084    }
085
086    N valueOf(double value);
087
088    Comparator<N> comparator();
089
090    default N max(N first, N second) {
091        return isGreaterThan(second, first) ? second : first;
092    }
093
094    default N min(N first, N second) {
095        return isGreaterThan(first, second) ? second : first;
096    }
097
098    N clamp01(N value);
099
100    N epsilon();
101
102    N log(N value);
103
104    default N pow(N base, int times) {
105        for (int i = 1; i < times; i++) {
106            base = multiply(base, base);
107        }
108        return base;
109    }
110
111    boolean isInstance(Object value);
112
113    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
114    default N cast(Object value) {
115        if (isInstance(value)) {
116            return (N) value;
117        } else {
118            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot cast value to target number type: " + value);
119        }
120    }
121
122}
